input.sentences: everybody was gathering to hear the exciting keynote speaker at the conference on creative commons .
before the big keynote | there was a special live organization question and answer session .
the big moment came as we heard a great speech about copyright .
later | at the after party | conference attendees were treated to some live music .
three attendees take a moment to pose in front of a car as they walk the red carpet for the big conference gala event .
output.sentences: The keynote speaker began to deliver a well rehearsed speech to the guests in attendance.
The topic was a special session over political engagement.
The speaker took a moment to pause, thinking hard, then chose to drop his speech notes.
He spoke directly from the heart, connecting with the audience and after the stage filled with the entertainment, treating the party guests to music.
After the event came to a close, everyone filed out of the conference hall and walked out, posing for pictures on a red carpet.
